name: discord-emoji
description: A near exact emoji tables of Discord for string-based insertion of emotes without having to escape Unicode.
author: Samuel Voeller <samuel.voeller@mxsrv.amethyst.live> (https://invite-to.amethyst.live)

scripts.detect-dist: node -e "const dist = require('fs').existsSync('dist'); console.info('Distribution:', (dist ? 'Available. Using distribution.' : 'Not available. Building from source.')); if (dist) process.exit(0); process.exit(1);"
scripts.prepare: husky install && npm run detect-dist || npm exec --package=typescript -c 'tsc --project ./dist.tsconfig.json'
